{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_DoorSlide}} {{Special|8|po, speed, angle, dist, delay|Polyobject|DoorSlide}}
Moves a [[polyobject]], waits, and then moves it back to its original location.
* ''po'': polyobject to move * ''speed'': how quickly to move the polyobject * ''angle'': direction to move the polyobject in (this is a [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]]) * ''dist'': distance to move the polyobject * ''delay'': delay in tics before returning to original position
==Examples== *[https://www.mediafire.com/file/4cx4x5xkxdp9d7h/PolySLIDE_2.wad Example map : open a 2 part door with almost infinite closing delay ]
